dublin_core.dcvalue: Several interviews are presented with AIDS patients who have been successful at controlling their disease using supplements in combination with drug therapy A brief anecdote of a breast cancer patient who experienced a substantial reduction in her breast tumor after taking NK911 is included The first interview examines one patient s ability to reduce his viral load from 50 000 to non detectable levels in 5 weeks using Naltrexone ginger root garlic and coconut oil The second interview discusses another patient s use of BHT in a lemon olive oil drink to successfully combat CMV The third interview reveals a patient s success at dropping HIV viral load and increasing CD4 counts using Naltrexone and NK911 and supplementing with coconut oil garlic and raw goat s milk The final AIDS related interview discusses a New York patient s switch from one triple combination therapy from which there were complications to the successful use of Naltrexone garlic and ginger root A list of volunteer names phone numbers and their protocols is provided
